message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a host of features that will enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Let's start with an offer of $150 for this exceptional product. Looking forward to your response.

I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get a better deal. Can you meet me at $120?
